abstract: The album, called "Lioness: Hidden Treasures," will be released on Dec. 5 by Island Records and will include Ms. Winehouse's covers of songs like "Will You Still Love Me Tomorrow" and "The Girl From Ipanema" as well as original compositions.
snippet: The album, called "Lioness: Hidden Treasures," will be released on Dec. 5 by Island Records and will include Ms. Winehouse's covers of songs like "Will You Still Love Me Tomorrow" and "The Girl From Ipanema" as well as original compositions.

headline.main: Posthumous Amy Winehouse Album Will Be Released in December
headline.print_headline: Winehouse Album to Be Released in December
